duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform pest control services at customer locations, ensuring the safe and effective application of company products.
Build and maintain customer relationships, schedule appointments, and provide sales support to existing and potential customers.
Operate and maintain company-provided vehicle and equipment to carry out pest control services effectively.
Utilize state-of-the-art tools, technology, and communication skills to perform duties and interact with customers.
Adhere to federal, state, and local regulations for pest control services, including the safe handling of products and maintenance of required licenses and certificates.
Participate in training and onboarding programs to develop expertise in pest control and related services.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED; or one to three months related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
